title: Tom Hardy and Wife Charlotte Riley Welcome Their First Child Together
text:
Comments The 'Mad Max: Fury Road' actor welcomes his second child just several weeks after announcing his wife was expecting a baby. 
Tom Hardy has welcomed another addition to his growing family. According to a scoop from The Daily Mail, his wife Charlotte Riley has just given birth to their child. The name and gender of the baby are still unclear. The baby arrived just several weeks after the pregnancy news broke out. Riley showed off baby bump when supporting the " Mad Max: Fury Road " actor at the premiere of his new movie " Legend " in London last month. Tom Hardy and Charlotte Riley started dating after they worked together on set of TV series "The Take" and "Wuthering Heights". They tied the knot in 2014. The baby will be the first child for her and the second for him. He has a son named Louis from a previous relationship.
